I have just started to explore JUnit. So far I have used Ant
to write test-scipts (based on the command line interface for my 
application). Of course, these test are not really unit tests, but 
application tests. Nevertheless, they are very useful.

My question is therefore, does anybody have any ideas about 
converting already existing Ant based tests to JUnit?

Basically, I am using some Ant functionality to copy directories 
files, call javac, and define some properties. I wouldn't like to 
rewrite all the scripts in Java, but calling Ant from JUnit turns out 
to be a bit ackward as well. Are there any other tools I might want 
to use?

Thanks for any help.
